text: “Ndithu kudziwa kwa nthawi (yakutha kwa dziko) kuli ndi Allah (Yekha). Iye ndiamene amavumbitsa mvula (nthawi imene wafuna); ndipo akudziwa zimene zili m’ziberekero. Ndipo aliyense sadziwa chomwe apeze mawa; (chabwino kapena choipa); ndiponso sadziwa aliyense kuti ndi dziko liti adzafera. Ndithu Allah Ngodziwa zedi, Ngozindikira kwambiri
